Tom,

  Thank you for relaying the sad news. Although I have great respect for 
Sasama-sensei (and four of his books), I was not fortunate enough to have 
met him personally. I had hoped for an opportunity at Soma next year. His 
contributions to field of japanese armouring are enormous. He will be 
greatly missed.

  I will contact you off list.

M J Peters
